name: Cosmic Penguins VR
description: The legend of the Eskimo God has been passed down from generation to generation. As the caretaker of the cosmic penguins who watch over the world and maintain balance in the universe, it is your job to keep them safe. Make sure the cosmic penguins stay on their iceberg and keep them from falling into the mouth of the cosmic killer whale that threatens the very lifeblood of the universe. With your cosmic powers you can defeat the whale and embody the penguins to restore the iceberg that watches over the world for all time.
